text:
Jessica Alba is saying goodbye to another beloved pet.

After the actress Instagrammed about the recent death of her pet pug, Sid, on July 27 LINK, on Monday, Alba shared that her dog Bowie has also died.

"Came home to a dog-less home -- our sweet girl Bowie is now resting in peace with her sister Sidders," Alba wrote alongside pics of Bowie snuggling with both her and her daughters, Honor and Haven. "It's been a rough two weeks. Will cherish our last night cuddling forever. Bowmeister was the sweetest love bug. RIP Bowie."

NEWS: Jessica Alba Reveals 'Unusual' Requirements for Baby No. 3's Name

In happier news, the 36-year-old actress -- who's currently pregnant with her third child -- stunned with her daughters at an event for a new diaper collaboration between her The Honest Company and fashion brand The Great on Saturday. Alba was supported by her famous pals, including Rachel Zoe and Molly Sims.

PICS: Pregnant Jessica Alba Wraps Up 'Epic' Family Vacation in Hawaii With Sweet Message

Of course, Alba and her husband, Cash Warren, have plenty of celebrity friends. In April, her Prince vs. Michael Jackson-themed birthday bash was attended by Beyonce, Kelly Rowland, Nicole Richie and more.

Watch below:
